      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BillCreationException
      Exception thrown for a POST when the Bill cannot be created.
      class  BillDeliveryException
      Exception thrown for a POST when the Bill cannot be delivered.

      Methods in com.bitpay.sdk.model.payout that throw BitPayException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Payout.setCurrency​(String currency)
      Sets currency code set for the batch amount (ISO 4217 3-character currency code).
      void Payout.setLedgerCurrency​(String ledgerCurrency)
      Sets Ledger currency code (ISO 4217 3-character currency code), it indicates on which ledger the payout request will be recorded.
